it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.model.match

Class MatchCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.model.match.MatchCreator

  • public class MatchCreator
extends Object
    Helper static class used by ModelImpl to create a new Match This class uses
    • BoardCreator
    • ActionCardCreator
    • AmmoCardCreator
    • PowerupCreator
    • WeaponCreator
    Using the methods in this class without loading JSON resources in these creators first might lead to unexpected behavior (e.g. empty card stacks)
    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Match createMatch(Set<String> usernames, MatchConfiguration configuration)
      Creates a new match in its initial state, according to provided configuration This method uses the following creators to get needed resources BoardCreator ActionCardCreator AmmoCardCreator PowerupCreator WeaponCreator Make sure they have loaded their data from file before calling this method, because it may lead to unexpected behavior, such as empty card stacks.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • createMatch

        public static Match createMatch(Set<String> usernames,
                                MatchConfiguration configuration)
        Creates a new match in its initial state, according to provided configuration This method uses the following creators to get needed resources
        • BoardCreator
        • ActionCardCreator
        • AmmoCardCreator
        • PowerupCreator
        • WeaponCreator
        Make sure they have loaded their data from file before calling this method, because it may lead to unexpected behavior, such as empty card stacks.

        This method does not select the first player and does not fill the board with ammo and weapons, this has to be done later

        If the match could not be created for some reason, returns null

        Parameters:
        usernames - set with the names of the players who will play in the match
        configuration - configuration of the match, usually obtained by first player, which is supposed to be valid
        Returns:
        the created match if creation was successful, null if unable to create it
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if null parameters are provided
        IllegalArgumentException - if there are too many players (more than the colors), if the provided skulls are negative if the board id provided is invalid
        IllegalStateException - if the regular action card cannot be obtained by ActionCardCreator
        UncheckedIOException - if a weapon card that was correctly loaded on startup cannot be loaded from file anymore
